scripts.build:chrome: rm -rf ./tmp ./dist/chrome.zip && node build.js chrome && zip -j ./dist/chrome.zip background.js popup.html popup.js ./tmp/manifest.json options.html options.js 128.png 128-gray.png && rm -rf ./tmp
scripts.build:firefox: rm -rf ./tmp ./dist/firefox.zip && node build.js firefox && zip -j ./dist/firefox.zip background.js popup.html popup.js ./tmp/manifest.json options.html options.js 128.png && rm -rf ./tmp
